subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Johnny Weir of the United States won the men’s figure skating title at the Cup of Russia in Moscow over the two-time world champion Stephane Lambiel of Switzerland. Kim Yu-na of South Korea won the women’s gold medal for her second victory in a Grand Prix event this season.
